name: Voice of Barbados
description:
Originally transmitting as VOB 790 am since 1981, Voice Of Barbados has established itself as the premier News/Talk and Community outlet in the nation.
	Show more

name: Hot 95.3
description: HOTT FM was established on December 1st 1997, for the youth market. Broadcasting 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, the station plays the hottest music and features vibrant young personalities in touch with their target audience. The HOTT 95.3 FM format also includes specially produced news packages for the young active listener. Broadcasting on 953. FM, the station is the number one choice for audiences under 35.

name: SLAM 101.1 FM

name: Life 97.5 FM
description: LIFE 97.5FM offers a powerful Gospel format targeting the predominately Christian population of Barbados by sharing the gospel through music, word, and powerful and insightful programming.

name: The Beat 104.1 FM
description:
With the best contest, events, promotions, award winning news and sports, this is The Beat 104.1 FM!
The Beat 104.1 FM leads the way in showcasing the best contemporary hit music from all around the world. From Pitbull to The 1975, Lorde to Katy Perry, Pharrell to Rihanna, John Newman to Hedley, Sara Bareilles to Justin Timberlake, Beyonce to Imagine Dragons and more.

name: CBC
description: Barbados’ best sound on the airwaves is beginning to make a loud roar. It’s the only station in Barbados that plays the best of the 70’s, 80’s and 90’s

name: THE ONE
description: It's the trendy, hang-out spot on the FM Radio dial. A fun, busy station that attracts listeners who are between the ages of 15 and 25.

name: Love 104.1 FM
description: Love 104.1 FM welcome all of you to the house of romantic music that has been designed to give you the best radio experience no matter weather you are living in Barbados or anywhere else in the world.

name: Q IN THE COMMUNITY
description:
Q In The Community started a few years ago as a weekly radio programme on Q 100.7 fm a station of the Caribbean Broadcasting Corporation whose target group is the over 40 age demographic. Hosted by Larry Mayers, it was broadcast live on location from 11AM – 1 AM from various communities, primarily rum shops which are found in almost every Barbadian village.
	Show more

name: Y 103.3 FM
description:
Broadcasting from Haggatt Hall, Barbados, playing the cool blend of music from the 80s, 90s and NOW!
A member of Power Broadcasting.

name: Mix 96.9 FM
description:
The VERY BEST music from THE BEST MUSIC CHARTS from around the world played out to you 24-7 on 96.9Mhz on the FM band in Barbados. 
On this page you can listen to our podcasts, view photos, watch videos, find out about us, connect with our friends and listeners. 
MIX 96 is good positive music catering to everyone who loves new, trending, or almost unheard of music. Great place to expand your music tastes.

name: Vogue Play BB
description: Your Most Wanted Hit-List Music Station. Non Stop Music, Just For You.
